00019 #ifndef _FFT_RESULT_POWERSPECTRUM_LINE_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_RESULT_POWERSPECTRUM_LINE_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00028 
00029 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00030 #include "FFTProcessor/Result.hpp"
00031 #include "logging.hpp"
00032 #include "netpbm.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace Result {
00035   class PowerSpectrumLine : public Base {
00036   public:
00037     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PowerSpectrumLine> sptr;
00038     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PowerSpectrumLine> Handle;
00039     typedef frequency_vector<double> PowerSpectrum;
00040 
00041     PowerSpectrumLine(ptime time, const PowerSpectrum&ps)
00042       : Base("PowerSpectrumLine", time) {
00043       std::string line;
00044       std::copy((char*)&time, (char*)&time+sizeof(time), std::back_inserter(line_));
00045       if (ps.empty())
00046         line_.append(2*sizeof(float), char(0));
00047       else {
00048         PowerSpectrum::const_iterator iMin(std::min_element(ps.begin(), ps.end(), PowerSpectrum::cmpSecond));
00049         const float slMin(std::log10(iMin->second));
00050         std::copy((char*)&slMin, (char*)&slMin+sizeof(slMin), std::back_inserter(line_));
00051         
00052         PowerSpectrum::const_iterator iMax(std::max_element(ps.begin(), ps.end(), PowerSpectrum::cmpSecond));
00053         const float slMax(std::log10(iMax->second));
00054         std::copy((char*)&slMax, (char*)&slMax+sizeof(slMax), std::back_inserter(line_));
00055         
00056         BOOST_FOREACH(const PowerSpectrum::value_type& fs, ps)
00057           line_.push_back((unsigned char)((std::log10(fs.second) - slMin)/(slMax-slMin)*255));
00058       }
00059     }
00060 
00061     ~PowerSpectrumLine() {}
00062     virtual std::string toString() const { 
00063       return Base::toString() + " size=" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(line_.size());
00064     }
00065 
00066     virtual std::string lineBreak() const { return ""; }
00067     virtual std::string fileExtension() const { return "pnm";  }
00068     virtual file_period filePeriod() const { return gen_filename::Period5Minutes; }
00069     virtual boost::filesystem::fstream& dumpHeaderToFile(boost::filesystem::fstream& os) const {
00070       netpbm::pgm_writer pw(line_.size(), os);
00071       pw.write_header();
00072       return os;
00073     }
00074     virtual boost::filesystem::fstream& dumpDataToFile(boost::filesystem::fstream& os) const {
00075       netpbm::pgm_writer pw(line_.size(), os);
00076       pw.read_header();
00077       ASSERT_THROW(pw.write_line(line_) == true);
00078       return os;
00079     }
00080     virtual void updateTimeTag(boost::filesystem::fstream& os,
00081                                std::ostream::streampos pos,
00082                                std::string timeTag) const {
00083       // NOP
00084     }
00085     virtual std::string format() const { return "PGM_0000"; }
00086 
00087   protected:
00088   private:
00089     std::string line_;
00090   } ;
00091 } // namespace Result
00092 
00093 #endif // _FFT_RESULT_POWERSPECTRUM_LINE_HPP_cm101026_
